bibl.title: Philoteris in the Themistou Meris. Report on the Archaeological Survey Carried out as Part of the Fayum Survey Project.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. General description of the remains of Philoteris and its environment. - 2. Earlier visitors to Philoteris. - 3. The survey of the main kom. - 4. The North Temple. - 5. The cemeteries. - 6. The canal system around Philoteris. - 7. The basins north of the kom. - 8. Survey of the papyrological evidence. - 9. Small finds. - 10. Conclusion. - Pp. 301-305: Donald M. BAILEY, Appendix. Surface pottery from Philoteris (AD 2000-3).

RÖMER Cornelia Eva, in collaboration with Donald M. BAILEY, Patrick BROSCH, Christopher KIRBY, Saad EL-MUHAMMAD and Dirk OBBINK, Philoteris in the Themistou Meris. Report on the Archaeological Survey Carried out as Part of the Fayum Survey Project.
ZPE 147 (2004) pp. 281-305, 1 tabl., 3 figg. et pll. I-IV et 1 plan dépl.
Römer Bailey Brosch Kirby el-Muhammad Obbink
